item.title: Plain White T's - 1234 - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song 1234 by Plain White T's from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, Bm7, D, G, Gm.

item.title: The All American Rejects - Gives You Hell - Key of E - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Gives You Hell by The All American Rejects from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, A7, B, C♯m7, E, F♯m, G♯m.

item.title: Colbie Caillat - Fallin' For You - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Fallin' For You by Colbie Caillat from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, B, C♯m7, E, F♯m, G♯m.

item.title: Eric Clapton - Change The World - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Change The World by Eric Clapton from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, A6, A7, B, Bm7, Cm7, C♯m7, E, E7, Esus4, F♯m, Gm, G♯, G♯m.

item.title: Justin James - Perfect Sometimes - Key of D - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Perfect Sometimes by Justin James from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, Bm7, D, Em, G.

item.title: Jack Johnson - Rodeo Clowns - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Rodeo Clowns by Jack Johnson from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, C♯m, F♯, F♯m, G♯.

item.title: Third Eye Blind - Never Let You Go - Key of E - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Never Let You Go by Third Eye Blind from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, B, E.

item.title: Colbie Caillat - I Do - Key of A - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song I Do by Colbie Caillat from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, Asus4, Bm, Bm7, C♯7, D, Dm7, E, F♯m.

item.title: Coldplay - Every Teardrop is a Waterfall - Key of A - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Every Teardrop is a Waterfall by Coldplay from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, C♯m7, D, E, F♯m.

item.title: "Winter Wonderland" Ukulele Play-Along! - Key of F - Ukulele Underground

item.description: Play along video for the song Under The Bridge by Red Hot Chili Peppers from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, Am, B, C♯m7, E, Emaj7, F, G.

item.description: Play along video for the song Summer Paradise by Simple Plan from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, Bm7, D, F♯, G.
